item.description: Trailhead: Take I93 north to exit 35,take US3 north,make a right onto US302,make a left onto Cog Railway Base Station Road,make a right onto Mount Clinton Road,trailhead parking lot on left side of the road.We will hike the Edmands Path to the summit of Mount Eisenhower (4780').Bald summit with views in all directions.This is a strenuous hike. 7.2 miles round trip, 9 hours estimated time.------Steve------As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: MOUNT EISENHOWER
